lemma (in encoding_wrt_barbs) rel_with_target_impl_TRel_weakly_preserves_barbs: fixes TRel :: "('procT \<times> 'procT) set" and Rel :: "(('procS, 'procT) Proc \<times> ('procS, 'procT) Proc) set" assumes preservation: "rel_weakly_preserves_barbs Rel (STCalWB SWB TWB)" and targetInRel: "\<forall>T1 T2. (T1, T2) \<in> TRel \<longrightarrow> (TargetTerm T1, TargetTerm T2) \<in> Rel" shows "rel_weakly_preserves_barbs TRel TWB"
